title: Any one know this font?
content:
At least any similar font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/118910_el%20estiro%20car%20wash_4650.jpg)

 [‹ UK Sport supplement typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132/http:/typophile.com/node/46926 "Go to previous forum topic") [Identify please. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132/http:/typophile.com/node/46925 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content:
It’s hand written so we can’t get too close with a font, but here are a few blackletters of similar construction:

[Beluga](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/beluga_lt_regular/?sample_text=El%20Estero)  
 [Lucida Blackletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/lucida_blackletter_ot_std/?sample_text=El%20Estero)  
 [Ramsey](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/ramsey_regular/?sample_text=El%20Estero)  
 [Wedding Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/wedding_text_regular/?sample_text=El%20Estero)
I dont think it is hand written. This is image got bluered very much, so looks bad. See the “E”. Bots “E” are the same.
Hmm, I know that image quality can distort the letterforms, but these appear very different to me. The stroke angles are different, not just the details.

GOT THE CLEAR IMAGE, MAY BE IT WILL HELP.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/el-estero-car-wash-logo12_4369.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630223132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/el-estero-car-wash-logo_6389.jpg)

I agree with Stephen. This is hand-painted.

- Lex
